A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw 'The Last Jedi' a couple weeks ago. The audience score seems pretty accurate to me. The main issue I have with this movie is that it's sloppy. I don't care what your politics are\, if you tell a good story\, I'll probably enjoy it. TLJ is simply an average popcorn flick with really nice special effects. Oh yeah\, and the pacing and subplots are pretty bad.. See Blade Runner 2049 instead.
